meanings.definition: A pair of bags or pouches attached to a saddle for carrying personal belongings.
meanings.sent1: The cowboy packed his saddlebags with food and water for the long journey.
meanings.sent2: The traveler's saddlebags were filled with maps and supplies for the adventure.
meanings.sent3: When the horse saw the saddlebags, it thought they were full of tasty treats.
meanings.sent4: Her saddlebags bulged with treasures collected from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The worn leather of the saddlebags told stories of countless travels.

meanings.definition: Excess fat on the outer thighs or hips that creates a bulging appearance.
meanings.sent1: She felt self-conscious about the saddlebags on her hips when trying on jeans.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise can help reduce the appearance of saddlebags on the thighs.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his saddlebags were proof of enjoying too many desserts.
meanings.sent4: The weight loss program promised to target stubborn saddlebags for a slimmer look.
meanings.sent5: The fashion industry often promotes ways to hide saddlebags with clever clothing choices.
